channel.title: Metric on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Metric on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: Metric Signs In Use on I-19 South
item.description: Metric Signs in Use on I-19 South. All distance markers and interchanges marked in kilometers or meters. Mileposts are signed in kilometers. There are mileposts signed as miles that are parallel to the road (signed 90 degrees to the standard signs).

item.title: BC-21 North - Think Metric
item.description: Think Metric sign on BC-21 north, just past the Rykerts Port of Entry. 50 MPH = 80 km/h.

item.title: Metric Signs In Use on I-19 South
item.description: Metric Signs in Use on I-19 South. All distance markers and interchanges marked in kilometers or meters. Mileposts are signed in kilometers. There are mileposts signed as miles that are parallel to the road (signed 90 degrees to the standard signs).

item.title: BC-13 North - Think Metric
item.description: Think Metric Sign at USA-Canada Border on BC-13 North.
